an4.219:1: "Bhikkhus, one possessing four qualities is deposited in hell as if brought there. What four? One is devoid of faith, immoral, morally shameless, and morally reckless. One possessing these four qualities is deposited in hell as if brought there.
an4.219:2: "Bhikkhus, one possessing four qualities is deposited in heaven as if brought there. What four? One is endowed with faith, virtuous, and has a sense of moral shame and moral dread. One possessing these four qualities is deposited in heaven as if brought there."
